00016   lcio::LCCollection *Histogram2DCollection_t::createHistograms(const std::string &collection_name, 
00017                                                                 const EVENT::StringVec &name_list, UInt_t n_hist, 
00018                                                                 const HistPar &x_par,
00019                                                                 const HistPar &y_par) 
00020     throw (std::bad_alloc, std::runtime_error)
00021   {
00022     deleteCollection();
00023 
00024     if (collection_name.empty()) {
00025       throw std::runtime_error("HistMgr::createHistograms> The collection name must not be empty.");
00026     }
00027     
00028     assert ( name_list.empty() || name_list.size()==n_hist );
00029     for (EVENT::StringVec::const_iterator name_iter=name_list.begin();
00030          name_iter!=name_list.end();
00031          name_iter++) {
00032       assert ( !name_iter->empty() );
00033     }
00034     
00035     if (x_par.xMax()<=x_par.xMin() || x_par.nBins()==0) {
00036       throw std::runtime_error("HistMgr::createHistograms> The number of bins is zero or the range is empty.");
00037     }
00038     if (y_par.xMax()<=y_par.xMin() || y_par.nBins()==0) {
00039       throw std::runtime_error("HistMgr::createHistograms> The number of bins is zero or the range is empty.");
00040     }
00041     
00042     //  std::string full_histogram_name=group;
00043     //  full_histogram_name+="::";
00044     //  full_histogram_name+=collection_name;
00045     
00046     delete _histogramCol;
00047     delete _majorIndex;
00048     _majorIndex=0;
00049 
00050     _histogramCol=new lcio::LCCollectionVec( lcio::LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT );
00051     //DEBUG    stat_add(_histogramCol);
00052 
00053     if (name_list.empty()) {
00054       EVENT::StringVec temp;
00055       temp.push_back(collection_name);
00056       _histogramCol->parameters().setValues(Histogram2DCollection_t::__histogramNameParameterName,temp);
00057     }
00058     else {
00059       _histogramCol->parameters().setValues(Histogram2DCollection_t::__histogramNameParameterName,*(const_cast<EVENT::StringVec*>(&name_list)));
00060     }
00061     
00062     for (UInt_t hist_i=0; hist_i<n_hist; hist_i++) {
00063       FloatHistogram2D *a_hist=new FloatHistogram2D(hist_i,x_par,y_par);
00064       _histogramCol->addElement(a_hist);
00065     }
00066 
00067     return _histogramCol;
00068   }
00069 
00070   lcio::LCCollection *Histogram2DCollection_t::createHistograms(const std::string &collection_name, 
00071                                                                 const EVENT::StringVec &name_list, const lcio::IntVec &n_hist_list, 
00072                                                                 const HistPar &x_par,
00073                                                                 const HistPar &y_par) 
00074     throw (std::bad_alloc,std::runtime_error)
00075   {
00076     
00077     if (collection_name.empty()) {
00078       throw std::runtime_error("HistMgr::createHistograms> The histogram name must not be empty.");
00079     }
00080     
00081     //    assert ( !n_hist_list.empty() );
00082     assert ( name_list.empty()  || name_list.size()==n_hist_list.size() );
00083     
00084     for (EVENT::StringVec::const_iterator name_iter=name_list.begin();
00085          name_iter!=name_list.end();
00086          name_iter++) {
00087       assert ( !name_iter->empty() );
00088     }
00089     
00090     if (x_par.xMax()<=x_par.xMin() || x_par.nBins()==0) {
00091       throw std::runtime_error("HistMgr::createHistograms> The number of bins is zero or the range is empty.");
00092     }
00093     if (y_par.xMax()<=y_par.xMin() || y_par.nBins()==0) {
00094       throw std::runtime_error("HistMgr::createHistograms> The number of bins is zero or the range is empty.");
00095     }
00096     
00097     //    std::string full_histogram_name=group;
00098     //    full_histogram_name+="::";
00099     //    full_histogram_name+=collection_name;
00100 
00101     delete _histogramCol;
00102     delete _majorIndex;
00103 
00104     _histogramCol=new lcio::LCCollectionVec( lcio::LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT );
00105     //DEBUG    stat_add(_histogramCol);
00106 
00107     if (name_list.empty()) {
00108       EVENT::StringVec temp;
00109       temp.push_back(collection_name);
00110       _histogramCol->parameters().setValues(Histogram2DCollection_t::__histogramNameParameterName,temp);
00111     }
00112     else {
00113       _histogramCol->parameters().setValues(Histogram2DCollection_t::__histogramNameParameterName,*(const_cast<EVENT::StringVec*>(&name_list)));
00114     }
00115     
00116     UInt_t n_hist=0;
00117     lcio::IntVec *index=new lcio::IntVec;
00118     index->resize(n_hist_list.size()+1);
00119     for (UInt_t index_i=0; index_i<n_hist_list.size(); index_i++) {
00120       (*index)[index_i]=n_hist;
00121       n_hist+=n_hist_list[index_i];
00122     }
00123     (*index)[n_hist_list.size()]=n_hist;
00124 
00125     _histogramCol->parameters().setValues(Histogram2DCollection_t::__majorIndexParameterName,*index);
00126     _majorIndex=index;
00127     
00128     for (UInt_t hist_i=0; hist_i<n_hist; hist_i++) {
00129       FloatHistogram2D *a_hist=new FloatHistogram2D(hist_i,x_par,y_par);
00130       _histogramCol->addElement(a_hist);
00131     }
00132     return _histogramCol;
00133   }
